install.name: TinkerForms
install.author: Dan Rahmel
install.description: Setup and configuration for display of Tinker Forms plugin.

administration.sql: CREATE TABLE `tinkerforms_forms` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sql` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'SQL Statement for query', `json` text COMMENT 'JSON data describing display', `html` text COMMENT 'HTML output for override', `name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `type` char(2) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, `date_modified` datetime NOT NULL, `archived` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
